      • routingDistance

        public double routingDistance(Number dest)
        Computes the distance along a map. Requires a IMapEnvironment.
        Parameters:
        dest - the destination, in form of ProtelisNode ID. Non integer numbers will be cast to integers by Number.intValue().
        Returns:
        the distance on a map
